mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.name, r.address, r.price, r.title, COUNT(rv.review_id) AS reviewCount, COALESCE(AVG(rv.score), 0) AS reviewScore FROM rooms r LEFT JOIN books b ON r.room_id = b.room_id LEFT JOIN review rv ON b.book_id = rv.book_id WHERE r.is_active = 1 GROUP BY r.room_id ORDER BY r.room_id DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT file_url, file_name FROM image_files WHERE entity_type = 'rooms' AND entity_id = #{roomId};
SELECT category_id, name, category_order FROM categories ORDER BY category_order ASC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId};
